text:
PHILIP MORRIS

UA

RESEARCH CENTER: P.0.BOK 283, RICHMOND, VIRGINIA 3281 TELEPHONE (200 2712000

September 12, 1977

Dr. H. J. Minnemeyer, Chairman

TCRC
P. 0. Box 6248
Greensboro, NC 27405

Dear Dr. Minnemeyer:

Enclosed are 38 registration forms for the 31st TCRC and a
check for $1,038 to cover the cost for the following Philip

Morris employees:

1. P. Glenn Baker

2. Roger T. Bass

3. Joesph F. Bebbs

4: Gordon H. Bokelman

5. Robert D. Carpenter

6. William L. Carter

7. Warren E. Claflin

8. W. Noel Einolf

9: L. Mims Evans

10: Robert A. Fenner

11. Mable J. Flemin,

12. Andrew F. Friscl

13. Dr. Walter F. Gannon
14, Willard A. Geiszler
1S. Carol A. Greenslit

16. Dr. Homer A. Hartung
17. Robert W. Jenkins

18. Dr. William R. Johnson
19. Christopher N. Kounnas

20.
21.
22.
23.
24.
25.

30.

38.

William F. Kuhn

Robert A. Labonte

Robert M. Lehman

Louis L. Long _
Leo F. Weyer

Kathleen A. Mitchell

Richard Newman

Sohn Fs Nienow

Jerome's. Osmaloy

Milton B. Parrish

Dr, Robert B.  Selignan

John f. Sherwood :
Daniel L. Simpson 1

C. "Edvard Thonas iter 97
Richard N. Thomson.

Dr. Helmut Wakeham

Bruce E. Waymack

Janes E) Wickhan

Ds Louise’ Wu

 

Please note that there are only three cards with deviations in
registration--Dr. H. Wakeham's card indicates guest and is registered

for conference only. Mr.

R. D. Carpenter registers guest, and

Mr. Daniel L. Simpson is registered for conference only.

Yours truly,

Somber

(Urs.) Frances Scott

Encl: check

38 registration cards

summary: P. H. Minnemeyer, Chairman of the TCRC, sent the following letter to Philip Morris. The letter also included 38 registration forms and a check for $1,038 to cover the cost for Morris' employees. There are only three cards with deviations in the registration form.
